about.whyChooseSubtitle: Experience the difference with our commitment to quality and freshness
about.whyChooseIntro: At HomieBites, we understand that your daily meals should be more than just food‚Äîthey should be a source of comfort, nutrition, and joy. Our commitment goes beyond cooking; we create experiences that bring the warmth of home to your table every single day.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I place an order?
faq.a1: You can place an order via WhatsApp (+91-9958983578) or call us directly.
faq.a2: We deliver in three slots: Morning (7‚Äì10 AM), Noon (12‚Äì3 PM), Night (7‚Äì9 PM).
faq.q3: What areas do you deliver to?
faq.a3: Panchsheel Greens 1: Home delivery available. Pickup option from Tower A1 lobby. Outside Panchsheel Greens 1: Delivery available at gate only.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: Cash on Delivery, UPI, and online payments.
faq.a5: Yes, monthly subscription plans are available.
faq.a6: For Panchsheel Greens 1 residents: Home delivery to your doorstep or pickup from Tower A1 lobby. For outside Panchsheel Greens 1: Delivery available at the main gate only.

üçõ About HomieBites:

We serve fresh, home-cooked vegetarian meals prepared with care. Located at A1-405, Panchsheel Greens, we deliver daily tiffin throughout the neighborhood.

Founded in February 2024, our mission is to provide convenient access to healthy, home-style meals at affordable prices.
